ontologyFramework.OFErrorManagement.OFException

Class ExceptionData

  • java.lang.Object
    • ontologyFramework.OFErrorManagement.OFException.ExceptionData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ExceptionData
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class define an exception Object. In fact it can be initialized by the building mechanism relate to the exception and it contains all the needed information about it.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Buoncomapgni Luca
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Create a new object relate to an exception without specify which is the behavior of the system when the exception occurs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExceptionData

        public ExceptionData(java.lang.String individualName,
             java.lang.String message,
             boolean notifyFlag,
             boolean killFlag,
             int backTrace,
             OFExceptionNotifierInterface noti)
        Create a new object relate to an exception.
        Parameters:
        individualName - name of the ontological individual relate to this exception
        message - that the exception is caring out.
        notifyFlag - if it is true than the exception will be notified if it occurs. Otherwise it will never be notified.
        killFlag - if it is true than the system will be stopped as soon as this exception occurs. Otherwise the system will continuous its work with no guarantees.
        backTrace - define the number of back steps into the stack trace in order to give a better explanation of the exception.
        noti - class which describe how should the system react when this exception occurs.

      • ExceptionData

        public ExceptionData(java.lang.String individualName,
             java.lang.String message,
             boolean notifyFlag,
             boolean killFlag,
             int backTrace)
        Create a new object relate to an exception without specify which is the behavior of the system when the exception occurs. By default the framework will no do nothing about.
        Parameters:
        individualName - name of the ontological individual relate to this exception
        message - that the exception is caring out.
        notifyFlag - if it is true than the exception will be notified if it occurs. Otherwise it will never be notified.
        killFlag - if it is true than the system will be stopped as soon as this exception occurs. Otherwise the system will continuous its work with no guarantees.
        backTrace - define the number of back steps into the stack trace in order to give a better explanation of the exception.

    • Method Detail

      • getIndName

        public java.lang.String getIndName()
        Returns:
        the name of the ontological individual attached to this exception

      • getMess

        public java.lang.String getMess()
        Returns:
        the message that this exception is carring out.

      • isNotify

        public boolean isNotify()
        Returns:
        true if the exception must be notified; false if not

      • isKill

        public boolean isKill()
        Returns:
        true if the system should be stoppen when this exception occurs, false if not.

      • getBackStep

        public int getBackStep()
        Returns:
        the number of back steps into the stack trace in order to give a better explanation of the exception.

      • getNotifier

        public OFExceptionNotifierInterface getNotifier()
        Returns:
        the notifier instance which define what must be done when an exception occurs.

      • notifyException

        public void notifyException()
        notify the exception using the OFExceptionNotifier

      • setNotifier

        public void setNotifier(OFExceptionNotifierInterface notifier)
        Parameters:
        notifier - to set the class which defines what must be done when an exception occurs.
